body:
Hello!! Just got unbanned from the forums, and I'd like to first apologize for my recentire behavior on the forums, I promise to have a fresh start, and refrain from being toxic.

Big Thanks to Seth and Pizza for the help with my appeal  <3

Also, AMA
P.s, you ask for opinions im gonna be brutally honest.

It's Dawson btw :)
